Parameter.name: URL
Parameter.Description: part of url; Example of url: www.sql.ru/forum/{topic}

Property.name: Amount
Property.Description: Topics's amount of pages of posts If it is "a", it mean that we can load all posts on one page For example, url: http://www.sql.ru/forum/1167798-a/ - show all topic pages If it is number it mean than we must only load all pages by page-to-page
